query:
ALTER TABLE ai_conversations 
ADD COLUMN userId int NULL AFTER id,
ADD COLUMN conversationType enum('public','toney') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'public' AFTER artistId,
ADD COLUMN title varchar(255) NULL AFTER conversationType,
MODIFY COLUMN artistId int NULL,
MODIFY COLUMN context enum('career_advice','release_strategy','content_ideas','financial_planning','tour_planning','general','search') NOT NULL;

ALTER TABLE ai_conversations
ADD INDEX user_id_idx (userId),
ADD INDEX conversation_type_idx (conversationType);

ALTER TABLE ai_conversations
ADD CONSTRAINT ai_conversations_userId_fk FOREIGN KEY (userId) REFERENCES users(id);
